remarks: Preservation of the dual modular pair property in the one-to-one onto mapping between the two sublattices in Lemma 1.3 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2. (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mdslmd.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
mdslmd.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
mdslmd.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
mdslmd.4 $e |- D e. CH $.
mdsldmd1i $p |- ( ( ( A MH B /\ B MH* A ) /\ ( A C_ ( C i^i D ) /\ ( C vH D ) C_ ( A vH B ) ) ) -> ( C MH* D <-> ( C i^i B ) MH* ( D i^i B ) ) ) $.
